snippet.title: Draw Something 2™ Free- iPhone, iPod & iPad Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Gameplay Video of " Draw Something 2™ Free " by iGamesView (http://goo.gl/9bB6F)

Game Category: ["Games", "Word", "Photo & Video"]

App Link: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/draw-something-2-free/id602873438?mt=8

Want to see your game videos on this channel? Email us the details at info@igamesview.com
Connect with us for regular updates on iPhone, iPad, iPod Game Reviews, News, Previews, Trailers, Cheat Codes, Game Play Videos & Walkthroughs.

****************************************************************************
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/igamesview
Twitter @ iGamesView: http://twitter.com/iGamesView
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/user/iGamesView
Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/113561280080793713543/posts
********************************************
Logos and trademarks belong to respective owners.

iTunes Description
All new ways to draw, guess, and share with friends! Play Draw Something 2, the sequel to the smash-hit social drawing game loved by over 100 million players!

Create cool effects with dozens of new tools, patterns, stamps and colors - allowing you to transform even the simplest drawings into masterpieces.

For the first time ever, share your drawings in a feed for all of your friends to see! Follow your friends, celebs, and discover new artists - there's always something new, funny and inspiring to check out!


...And There's More!

• Gallery
A collection of all of your favorite drawings in one place

• Tons of New Words
Over 5,000 new words, including all new 9 letter words and phrases

• More Drawing Tools
Limitless creativity at your fingertips! Try out the Pixel pen, Pattern pencil, Stamps, Marker, Highlighter, Crayon and more. Plus, choose from over 100 vibrant colors

• All New Ways to Play
Earn coins for playing the Daily Guess and Daily Draw

• Free Draw
Draw anything. Try out your new tools, create and share something amazing

• Play with Friends
Challenge friends on Facebook or be automatically partnered with new people to play with

•Restricted Mode
Disable the Social Feed and
gallery using a PIN. You can still play turns with friends and contacts, but you won't see any social content

Become a fan! Get exclusive rewards and stay up to date all the latest news
